title: Like-Minded
description:
This episode is brought to you by the following advertisers:
Slack, a workplace communication hub. Find out more at slack.com.
Babbel, the #1-selling language learning app in the world. Get 50% off your 6-month subscription today at babbel.com/lexicon.
John McWhorter discusses the evolution of the word like.
Join Slate Plus! Members get bonus segments, exclusive member-only podcasts, and more. Sign up for a free trial today at www.slate.com/podcastsplus.
